import React,{Component} from 'react' import {Form,Button,FormGroup,Col,Label,FormFeedback} from 'reactstrap'; import {Formik,Field} from 'formik' import * as Yup from 'yup'; class Input extends Component { render(){ const SignupSchema = Yup.object().shape({ username: Yup.string() .min(2, 'Too Short!') .max(50, 'Too long!') .required('Required'), password: Yup.string() .min(8, 'Too Short!') .max(50, 'Too long!') .required('Required'), email: Yup.string() .email('Invalid email') .required('Required') }) return(
) } } export default Input
